text: 8.2: Mt 9.18 naŋga, Mk 1.40-44 naŋga, Lu 5.12-14 naŋga, Sɨ 10.25Kamatɨhi kru kandi lepra naŋga mɨŋga Jisas kɨyɨmiyɨ payɨmi. Kamata tanda mɨkwɨmɨkwɨnɨta ambami, Aru mɨŋga. Naŋ pirɨti nda yaŋ mɨŋavindamɨna Gotɨndu tamɨŋgaŋgɨmbañɨ ñaŋɨrandɨhin, vami.8.2 Juda hatindu tɨkatɨka kuyu ambami, Krunavundi kandi lepra naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ Gotɨndu tamɨŋgaŋgɨmbañɨ ñɨŋɨ naŋga ŋɨnɨŋ kɨndu. Ara ŋgahi kandi lepra ha yɨwarahi uta kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋ ŋgandu. Kamatɨhu kɨrañɨŋguhu haŋɨnɨŋ ŋgahu kandi lepra ha siŋgundɨhi ambandu, Krunavundi nɨŋɨnɨŋ Gotɨndu tamɨŋgaŋgɨmbañɨ ñaŋɨra yɨvurahayu, vamba ambandu, vami. Wok Pris 13 naŋga 14yɨ ŋgamara.
